name: Magical Girl Cupid!
description:
Yokai have materialized out of school supplies as a result of the student's growing hatred of school awakening them. Shoot the yokai full of love to calm them and finish them with a melee attack to heal yourself.

XBOX PLAYSTATION PC

Shoot:  Mouse Button 0

Alt Fire:   Mouse Button 1

Roll:   Space

Melee:

E

Lock-On:    Shift

Xbox controls are temporarily PS4 so the face buttons are swapped, camera and Movement Works though.

Keyboard support coming next week.

This is the texture used in every material for the game.

Programming: Sophie Kneznekoff

Art: Ja'ire Vaughn
